Q16_1: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - Intelligence is something people are born with that can't be changed.
Q16_2: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - No matter how intelligent you are, you can always be more intelligent.
Q16_3: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - You can always substantially change how intelligent you are.
Q16_4: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - You are a certain kind of person, and there is not much that can be done to really change that.

Q16_6: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - Musical talent can be learned by anyone.
Q16_7: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - Only a few people will be truly good at sports - you have to be "born with it".

Q16_9: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - The harder you work at something, the better you will be at it.
Q16_10: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - No matter what kind of person you are, you can always change substantially.
Q16_11: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - Trying new things is stressful for me and I avoid it.
Q16_12: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - Some people are good and kind, and some are not - it's not often that people change.
Q16_13: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - I appreciate when people, parents, coaches, teachers give me feedback about my performance.
Q16_14: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - I often get angry when I get negative feedback about my performance.
Q16_15: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - All human beings are capable of learning.
Q16_16: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - You can learn new things, but you can't really change how intelligent you are.
Q16_17: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - You can do things differently, but the important parts of who you are can't really be changed.
Q16_18: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - Human beings are basically good, but sometimes make terrible decisions.
Q16_19: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - An important reason why I do my school work is that I like to learn new things.
Q16_20: To what extent do you agree or disagree with these statements: - Truly smart people do not need to try hard.
